title: Why You Won't Beat the Stock Market (And What to Do Instead)
subtitle: Learn about the realities of investing and discover a simpler, more effective strategy.
content:
Why You Won't Beat the Stock Market (And What to Do Instead)

Here's exactly why you won't beat the stock market, and what to do instead.

1. Market as a Storm

The market isn't a puzzle to solve. It’s a storm to endure. Understanding this fundamental truth can help you approach investing with the right mindset.

2. Competing Against Machines

You’re not competing with your neighbor. You’re competing with billion-dollar machines trained by people who eat spreadsheets for breakfast. Yep, they do!

3. Even the Pros Get It Wrong

Even the pros get it wrong, a lot. They’ve got Bloomberg terminals and yachts, while you have Robinhood updates and a guy named CryptoMike234 on Reddit.

4. The Real Goal: Ownership

Stop trying to win. Just try to own. Buy a total stock market fund and go for a walk. It’s that simple.

Conclusion

If any of this is helpful, sign up for my free weekly newsletter by clicking the link in my bio.
